entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
